apps.name: POP UPI
apps.description: POP UPI is India’s most rewarding UPI app. Send money instantly and earn cash rewards with every transaction.
earningSteps: Step 1: Download POP UPI using referral link
Step 2: Sign up and enter referral code SH16OLZMOM
Step 3: Send money to anyone via POP UPI
Step 4: Complete first successful transaction
Step 5: Earn ₹5 instant cash reward
terms: Valid for new users only
Minimum ₹1 transaction required
Reward credited instantly
One reward per referral
Subject to POP UPI terms and conditions

apps.name: PhonePe
apps.description: PhonePe is India’s go-to app for Money Transfers, Recharges, Bill Payments, and much more. Make instant payments to merchants and contacts using UPI.
earningSteps: Step 1: Download PhonePe using referral link
Step 2: Register with your mobile number linked to a bank account
Step 3: Set up your UPI PIN
Step 4: Make instant payments to merchants or contacts
Step 5: Enjoy seamless digital transactions
terms: Valid for users in India
Mobile number must be linked to a bank account
UPI PIN setup required
One account per user
Subject to PhonePe terms and conditions

apps.name: Slice UPI Savings
apps.description: Slice Savings lets your money earn daily interest at 100% RBI repo rate while you continue to use UPI for payments. Smarter than letting money sit idle in your account.
features: Daily interest at 100% RBI repo rate
Track spending and savings in one app
earningSteps: Download the Slice app using referral link
Sign up and enter referral code KOUSH32707
Complete KYC verification
Start using UPI via Slice
Earn daily interest on your balance
terms: Valid only for new users joining via referral link
Referral code KOUSH32707 must be applied at signup
Interest credited daily based on repo rate
Subject to Slice terms and conditions

apps.name: Google Pay
apps.description: Google Pay is India’s leading UPI app for secure payments, recharges, bill payments, and money transfers. Earn cashback rewards on transactions and referrals.
features: Works with major banks in India
earningSteps: Download Google Pay using referral link
Sign up with mobile number linked to your bank account
Enter referral code 11jm5i
Complete first UPI payment
Earn ₹21 cashback reward
terms: Valid for new Google Pay users only
Referral code 11jm5i must be applied at signup
Cashback credited after first payment
One referral reward per user
Subject to Google Pay terms and conditions

apps.name: mPokket
apps.description: mPokket offers instant cash loans up to ₹30,000 for students and salaried professionals. Get quick approval, instant transfer, and earn cashback on sign-up.
features: Available for students and salaried professionals
earningSteps: Download mPokket using referral link
Sign up with your mobile number
Enter referral code REF22919027
Complete KYC verification
Get ₹100 cashback after first loan disbursement
terms: Valid for new users only
Referral code REF22919027 must be entered at sign-up
Cashback credited after first successful loan
Loan approval subject to eligibility and credit check
Terms and conditions apply

apps.name: MobiKwik UPI
apps.description: MobiKwik is a leading digital payments app offering UPI transfers, wallet, and bill payments. Earn cashback rewards by making your first UPI transaction.
features: Send and receive money via UPI instantly
Recharge, pay bills, and shop online
Refer friends to earn extra cashback
earningSteps: Download the MobiKwik app using referral link
Setup MobiKwik UPI and complete KYC
Send ₹25 to any friend via UPI
Get ₹20 cashback in your wallet
Refer friends to earn more cashback
terms: Valid for new users only
Minimum ₹25 transaction required
Cashback credited within specified time
Referral rewards applicable per successful referral
Terms and conditions apply

apps.name: Rapido
apps.description: Rapido is India’s largest bike-taxi and auto service, offering affordable, comfortable, and quick rides in 100+ cities. Earn cashback rewards on your first ride.
features: Multiple payment options including cash and UPI
earningSteps: Download the Rapido app using referral link
Sign up and enter referral code CN415QG
Book your first ride with Rapido
Complete payment using any method
Get ₹25 cashback in your wallet
terms: Valid for new users only
Referral code CN415QG must be applied at signup
Cashback credited after first completed ride
Offer applicable in selected cities
Terms and conditions apply

apps.name: Uber Rides
apps.description: Uber is a global ride-hailing app offering affordable and convenient trips with bike, auto, and car options. New users get discounts on their first rides.
features: Affordable rides with bike, auto, and car options
Multiple payment options including cash, UPI, and cards
Discounts and offers for new users
earningSteps: Download the Uber app using referral link
Sign up with your mobile number or email
Book your first ride with Uber
Apply referral offer automatically
Enjoy 25% off on your first 3 trips
terms: Valid for new users only
Offer applicable on first 3 rides only
Maximum discount per ride may apply
Referral discount applied automatically
Terms and conditions apply

apps.name: RedBus
apps.description: RedBus is India’s No.1 online bus ticket booking platform with widest bus network. Book bus tickets easily and enjoy discounts & cashback on your first booking.
earningSteps: Download the RedBus app using referral link
Sign up with your mobile number
Enter referral code redofele at sign-up
Book your first bus ticket using code FIRST
Get 20% off (up to ₹150) + ₹100 cashback
terms: Valid for new users only
Referral code redofele must be entered at signup
Promo code FIRST applies on first booking
Cashback credited after first successful booking
Terms and conditions apply

creditCards.name: Edge+ CSB Bank RuPay Credit Card
creditCards.description: The Edge+ CSB Bank RuPay Credit Card offers up to 10% cashback on shopping, 5% cashback on travel, and 1% cashback on all other spends. It is lifetime free with ₹0 annual fees.
features: 1% assured cashback on all other spends
Works seamlessly on UPI & POS transactions
Lifetime free card with ₹0 annual fees
earningSteps: Apply for Edge+ CSB Bank RuPay Credit Card via Jupiter app using referral link
Enter referral code 8c8K2N within 14 days
Complete KYC verification
Get your card approved and activated
Receive ₹500 cashback as joining reward
terms: Valid only for new applicants via referral link
Referral code 8c8K2N must be applied within 14 days
₹500 cashback credited after successful card issuance
Lifetime free card – no annual fees
Subject to CSB Bank & Jupiter terms and conditions

creditCards.name: SuperMoney Credit Card
creditCards.description: The SuperMoney Credit Card offers a flat 3% cashback on all UPI spends. It is lifetime free with no annual charges, plus you can earn up to ₹250 cashback as a joining reward.
features: Flat 3% cashback on all UPI spends
earningSteps: Apply for SuperMoney Credit Card using referral link
Complete KYC verification process
Get your card approved and activated
Start making UPI spends using your SuperMoney card
Receive up to ₹250 cashback as welcome reward
terms: Offer valid only via referral link
Cashback credited after first successful spend
Joining reward up to ₹250 depends on eligibility
Lifetime free card – no annual fees
Subject to SuperMoney terms and conditions
